channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Damp mattres, 4th October

item.title: Obstruction of pathway due to flytipping, 4th October
item.description:
A fridge freezer has been dumped alongside some sort of electrical device not too sure what it is there is also bags of brick like rubble quite heavy too and a bit further down sees to be clothing / fabrics might be more stuff too but this is what i mainly saw location is at top of bullace row camberwell london se5 7hj just outside of 305 to 309 bullace row

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bullace Row, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continual flytipping, 4th October
item.description:

item.title: A commercial advertising board has been attached to the temporary tree post., 4th October
item.description:
